commits.message:
[GOC-2140] Remove unified payments feature flag for Good Chop (#61186)

Remove the `web_payment-page_goodchop_unified-payments` feature flag
and enable unified payments by default for Good Chop (MR).

Changes:
- Set isUMKPaymentEnabled to true in config for Good Chop US
- Remove feature flag checks from Payment.js and withCheckoutPayment.js
- Update E2E tests to remove feature flag enablement
